main event: A strange aerial object was sighted over Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania on April 7, 1953 at around 11:45 PM.
interesting points: The object appeared to change colors from white to red and back again as it moved slowly across the sky.
The object was silhouetted against the night sky and appeared to be elliptical in shape.
The object suddenly accelerated and disappeared from view.
This was one of a number of similar reports of strange aerial objects sighted over the Pittsburgh area in recent months.
The object was completely silent and made no sound at all during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, elliptical object that changed colors from white to red
witnesses: a single witness who was standing near the rear of his home
